title: CSS Pseudo-classes & Pseudo-elements Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of CSS pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements

questions.question: What does :hover do?
choices: Styles an element when the mouse is over it
questions.explanation: Styles an element when the mouse is over it — Common for links and buttons.

questions.question: Which pseudo-class selects every other list item?
What does ::after do?
choices: Changes the text of an element
Adds content after an element without changing the HTML
questions.explanation: Adds content after an element without changing the HTML — Often used for tooltips or decorative content.

questions.question: How do you combine a pseudo-class and pseudo-element?
questions.explanation: .element:hover::after — Apply pseudo-element only on certain states like hover.

questions.question: Why use pseudo-elements?
choices: To insert content or styling without changing HTML
questions.explanation: To insert content or styling without changing HTML — Keeps HTML clean while adding visuals.
